Comments_List: Learned a ton about microfluidic devices
Lectures are very boring. You probably don't have to go. However, the final presentation and NIH format paper were quite fun to work on
Would be more interesting if it was a lab course!

Would recommend for someone who is interested in BioMEMS and would wanna know more about it. You will learn a lot and most likely get an A. Lectures can be very boring, you can choose to skip them. Only one assignment all semester. The midterms are fine as long as you memorize a ton the night before. Overall, I think people should take this class. Prof Fan is a great professor.
